briefTitle: Relationship Between Body Composition, Food Consumption, and Micro and Macronutrients With Gene Expression in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Relationship Between Drug Therapy, Food Consumption, Body Composition and Plasma Micronutients Levels With the Expression of Genes Related to Metabolism, Aging and Immunity in Women With Breast Cancer.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Endocrine Therapy, Endocrine Therapy Adverse Reaction, Vitamin D Deficiency, Nutrition Disorders, Obesity
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer women under endocrine therapy or recurrence of disease after endocrine therapy
* Signed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Mental retardation
